name: Lumberhack'd
description:
Deduce the identity of the lumberjack slasher before there are no lumberjacks left to hack. Mark possible suspects or innocent tree-fellers, it's up to you! Switch into Accuse mode to guess the killer!

Built in 24 hours for the NOVA IGD Summer Jam.

Team members: Debbie Trader (@RyeTaran), Phillip Joseph (ig:philjoe90), and Micha Faw (@ghostmaple).
